TopicTitle: (RPS Review) Wot I Think: Kerbal Space Program

Articles.Content: [Rock Paper Shotgun just put out a Wot I Think on Kerbal Space Program](http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2015/05/13/review-kerbal-space-program/)! No numbers or anything to add to the metacritic score, but that's honestly one of the reasons why I prefer RPS. It reads quite positively to me, and was clearly written by someone who's been playing a long time.
